content.raw: Looks good to me! Just one extra comment: Is it possible to generate the urdf without having to press `CTRL-C` ? We might have to call this utility programmatically for every team and seems much more convenient if the generator program just returns when it finishes its job.
content.html: Looks good to me! Just one extra comment: Is it possible to generate the urdf without having to press CTRL-C ? We might have to call this utility programmatically for every team and seems much more convenient if the generator program just returns when it finishes its job.
